amendment.description: To add $308 million to Function 800 for GSA. Fully offset by Function 920.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3172 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3172 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S2275; text: CR S2275) To add $308 million to Function 800 for GSA. Fully offset by Function 920.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3172 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
